columns.name: gu_id
columns.comment: Internal unique ID for the authentication server

columns.name: gu_name
columns.comment: Username.

columns.name: gu_enabled
columns.comment: Timestamp of creation of the global account (unused)

columns.name: gu_enabled_method
columns.comment: Method used to create the global account (unused)

columns.name: gu_home_db
columns.comment: Local database name of the user's 'home' wiki. By default, the 'winner' of a migration check for old accounts or the account the user was first registered at for new ones. May be changed over time.

columns.name: gu_email
columns.comment: Registered email address, may be empty.

columns.name: gu_email_authenticated
columns.comment: Timestamp when the address was confirmed as belonging to the user. NULL if not confirmed.

columns.name: gu_salt
columns.comment: Salt. For migrated passwords, the salt is the local user_id.

columns.name: gu_password
columns.comment: hashed password

columns.name: gu_locked
columns.comment: If true, this account cannot be used to log in on any wiki.

columns.name: gu_hidden
columns.comment: If true, this account should be hidden from most public user lists. Used for 'deleting' accounts without breaking referential integrity.

columns.name: gu_hidden_level
columns.comment: If true, this account should be hidden from most public user lists. Used for 'deleting' accounts without breaking referential integrity.

columns.name: gu_registration
columns.comment: Registration time

columns.name: gu_password_reset_key
columns.comment: Random key for password resets

columns.name: gu_auth_token
columns.comment: Random key for crosswiki authentication tokens

columns.name: gu_cas_token
columns.comment: Value used for CAS operations
